product_name: The North Face Mt. Tam Crew Sweater - Women's - 2014 Closeout
long_description: A soft blend of wool, cashmere and cotton, the Mt. Tam women's sweater is just the right layer for hanging out fireside and then throwing on a jacket for venturing out into colder weather.
short_description: A soft blend of wool, cashmere and cotton, the Mt. Tam women's sweater is just the right layer for hanging out fireside and then throwing on a jacket for venturing out into colder weather.
